July 12, 1952 D Lydney Contest (Open Section)
Lydney Contest (Open Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Lydney Contest lydney-contest-open-section
None
Recollections of Mendelssohn
Lydney, Gloucestershire March on the road - 1st Ynyshir, 2nd Coventry Colliery, 3rd Revo Works. March played on stage - 1st Revo Works, 2nd Melingriffith. Prizes - 1st £40 and cup, 2nd £20, 3rd £10.
Feb. 20, 2013, 5:07 p.m. March 18, 2019, 11:36 a.m.
1 Coventry Colliery J. A. Greenwood
2 Foresters Brass Charles Albert Anderson
3 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Thomas James Powell
Unknown Result Lydney Band R. O. Hodges
Unknown Result Revo Works Unknown
Unknown Result Ynyshir Band Gordon Harris
Unknown Result Yorkley Onward Band Graham Watkins
